description: From Middle English derworth, dereworth, derworthe, dereworþe, from Old English dēorwurþe, dēorwyrþe, corresponding to dear +‎ -worth.

adjectives.description: dearworth (comparative more dearworth, superlative most dearworth)

examples: It is as derworth a drewery · as dere god hym-seluen.
